Nerangs.ab: yaθā ahū vairiiō do yasnəmca tā afrināmi haomahe aṣ̌auua.zaŋhō pas se šāh ō dast-e čab-e māhruy nahādan kenār-e zur čahār šāh andar hum-pyāle gozāštan va digar panǧ pārre-ye urvarām stadan b-āb pādyāvi šostan va čahār pārre andar hum-pāle gozāštan va yek pārre andar dast-e čab māhruy nahādan kenār-e hum

"(He should recite) two yaθā ahū vairiiō, yasnəmca until āfrināmi (with the šnūman) haomahe aṣ̌auua.zaŋhō. Then, he should put three twigs to the left side of the mahruy, next to the zur and leave four twigs in the hum-pyāle. Then he should take five pieces of urvarām, wash them with pādyāvi-water and leave four of them in the hum-pyāle and one to the left side of the māhruy, next to the hum."
